PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2020-04622020-06-17,  ,  ,  ,  ,  PSPC
ActNational Capital Act
SubjectLease with Vivid Contracting Inc. and Scott Lopes, as the indemnifier ** NCC **
PrecisOrder approving that National Capital Commission grant two options to extend the lease with VIVID CONTRACTING INC and SCOTT LOPES, as the indemnifier, for a period of five years, beginning on October 1, 2020 for the real property located at 225 Slack Road, in Ottawa, Ontario.
AttachmentsAttachment
